page.title: 09Leisure and Recreation.
page.content: There are many societies and organisations for the young to the elderly. Brownies, Model railway club which meet at Tidbury Green School, Earlswood Drama Group and "mini museum" at Earlswood Village Hall. There are several Women's Institutes, Young Farmer's Unions, sports clubs in the area. A "Log Cabin" on the edge of Earlswood Lakes provides an "outward bound" centre for Boys clubs, Cubs and Scouts. {Earlswood Methodist Church. provides a social programme for all ages which is well supported by local residents. These include Women's Institutes, Friends in Retirement, Nomads and a Shell group (youth club).
